datasource.description: Enable to include datasource information for each linked object.

count.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

skip_to.description: Skip to Nth CMDB entry. Only collect statistical data after it.

with_meta.description: Enable to include meta information about each object (type id, references, etc).

with_contents_hash.description: Enable to include a checksum of each object's contents.

skip.description: Enable to call CLI skip operator to hide skipped properties.

format.description: List of property names to include in results, separated by | (i.e. policyid|srcintf).

filter.description:
Filtering multiple key/value pairs
Operator     |   Description
==     |   Case insensitive match with pattern.
!=     |    Does not match with pattern (case insensitive).
=@     |    Pattern found in object value (case insensitive).
!@     |    ﻿Pattern not﻿ found in object value (case insensitive).
<=     |    Value must be less than or equal to ﻿pattern﻿.
<     |    Value must be less than pattern﻿.
.>=    |    Value must be greater than or equal to ﻿pattern﻿.
.>     |    Value must be greater than ﻿pattern﻿.
Logical OR    |    Separate filters using commas ','
Logical AND    |    Filter strings can be combined to create logical AND queries by including multiple filters in the request.
Combining AND and OR    |    You can combine AND and OR filters together to create more complex filters.

key.description: If present, objects will be filtered on property with this name.

pattern.description: If present, objects will be filtered on property with this value.

datasource_format.description: A map of datasources to a string of attributes, separated by | (ie: policyid|srcintf). If specified, this will add the attributes listed for any linked objects.

unfiltered_count.description: Maximum number of unfiltered entries to interate through.

stat-items.description: Items to count occurrence in entire response (multiple items should be separated by '|').

primary_keys.description: The primary key to find indexes for.

action.description:
default: Return the CLI default values for entire CLI tree.
meta: Return meta data for a specific object, table, or the entire CLI tree.
json-schema: Return JSON Schema for entire CLI tree.
schema: Return schema for entire CLI tree.

vdom.description:
Specify the Virtual Domain(s) from which results are returned or changes are applied to. If this parameter is not provided, the management VDOM will be used. If the admin does not have access to the VDOM, a permission error will be returned.
The URL parameter is one of:
vdom=root (Single VDOM)
vdom=vdom1,vdom2 (Multiple VDOMs)
vdom=* (All VDOMs)

Specify the Virtual Domain(s) from which results are returned or changes are applied to. If this parameter is not provided, the management VDOM will be used. If the admin does not have access to the VDOM, a permission error will be returned.
The URL parameter is one of:
vdom=root (Single VDOM)
vdom=vdom1,vdom2 (Multiple VDOMs)
vdom=* (All VDOMs)

action.description:
If supported, an action can be specified.
_move_: Move this specific resource.
When *action=move* is set, one of the extra parameters (*before*, *after*) must be provided.
__*Note:*__ If this parameter is provided when not supported, the action will be ignored and an “invalid request” error will be returned.

before.description:
If *action=move*, use *before* to specify the ID of the resource that this resource will be moved before.
For example, to move `object 1` to before `object 2`, use:
__action=move&before=2__
__*Note:*__ This parameter can only be used when the *action* parameter is set to *move*.

after.description:
If *action=move*, use *after* to specify the ID of the resource that this resource will be moved after.
For example, to move `object 1` to after `object 3`, use:
__action=move&after=3__
__*Note:*__ This parameter can only be used when the *action* parameter is set to *move*.

scope.description:
Specify the Scope from which results are returned or changes are applied to. Objects are only existed in VDOMs scope.
scope=vdom

GET.summary:
Select all entries in a CLI table.
 Access Group: vpngrp

PUT.summary:
Update this specific resource.
 Access Group: vpngrp

ocsp-status.name: ocsp-status
ocsp-status.help: Enable/disable receiving certificates using the OCSP.

options.name: enable
options.help: OCSP is performed if CRL is not checked.
options.label: Enable
options.description: OCSP is performed if CRL is not checked

options.name: mandatory
options.help: If cert is not revoked by CRL, OCSP is performed.
options.label: Mandatory
options.description: If cert is not revoked by CRL, OCSP is performed

options.name: disable
options.help: OCSP is not performed.
options.label: Disable
options.description: OCSP is not performed

ocsp-option.name: ocsp-option
ocsp-option.help: Specify whether the OCSP URL is from certificate or configured OCSP server.

options.name: certificate
options.help: Use URL from certificate.
options.label: Certificate
options.description: Use URL from certificate

options.name: server
options.help: Use URL from configured OCSP server.
options.label: Server
options.description: Use URL from configured OCSP server

proxy.name: proxy
proxy.help: Proxy server FQDN or IP for OCSP/CA queries during certificate verification.

source-ip.name: source-ip
source-ip.help: Source IP address for dynamic AIA and OCSP queries.

interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method
interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.

options.name: auto
options.help: Set outgoing interface automatically.
options.label: Auto
options.description: Set outgoing interface automatically

options.name: sdwan
options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.label: Sdwan
options.description: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules

options.name: specify
options.help: Set outgoing interface manually.
options.label: Specify
options.description: Set outgoing interface manually

interface.name: interface
interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.

vrf-select.name: vrf-select
vrf-select.help: VRF ID used for connection to server.

check-ca-cert.name: check-ca-cert
check-ca-cert.help: Enable/disable verification of the user certificate and pass authentication if any CA in the chain is trusted (default = enable).

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable verification of the user certificate.
options.label: Enable
options.description: Enable verification of the user certificate

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable verification of the user certificate.
options.label: Disable
options.description: Disable verification of the user certificate

check-ca-chain.name: check-ca-chain
check-ca-chain.help: Enable/disable verification of the entire certificate chain and pass authentication only if the chain is complete and all of the CAs in the chain are trusted (default = disable).

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable verification of the entire certificate chain.
options.label: Enable
options.description: Enable verification of the entire certificate chain

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable verification of the entire certificate chain.
options.label: Disable
options.description: Disable verification of the entire certificate chain

subject-match.name: subject-match
subject-match.help: When searching for a matching certificate, control how to do RDN value matching with certificate subject name (default = substring).

options.name: substring
options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a part or the same as a certificate subject RDN.
options.label: Substring
options.description: Find a match if the name being searched for is a part or the same as a certificate subject RDN

options.name: value
options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is same as a certificate subject RDN.
options.label: Value
options.description: Find a match if the name being searched for is same as a certificate subject RDN

subject-set.name: subject-set
subject-set.help: When searching for a matching certificate, control how to do RDN set matching with certificate subject name (default = subset).

options.name: subset
options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a subset of a certificate subject.
options.label: Subset
options.description: Find a match if the name being searched for is a subset of a certificate subject

options.name: superset
options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a superset of a certificate subject.
options.label: Superset
options.description: Find a match if the name being searched for is a superset of a certificate subject

cn-match.name: cn-match
cn-match.help: When searching for a matching certificate, control how to do CN value matching with certificate subject name (default = substring).

options.name: substring
options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a part or the same as a certificate CN.
options.label: Substring
options.description: Find a match if the name being searched for is a part or the same as a certificate CN

options.name: value
options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is same as a certificate CN.
options.label: Value
options.description: Find a match if the name being searched for is same as a certificate CN

cn-allow-multi.name: cn-allow-multi
cn-allow-multi.help: When searching for a matching certificate, allow multiple CN fields in certificate subject name (default = enable).

options.name: disable
options.help: Does not allow multiple CN entries in certificate matching.
options.label: Disable
options.description: Does not allow multiple CN entries in certificate matching

options.name: enable
options.help: Allow multiple CN entries in certificate matching.
options.label: Enable
options.description: Allow multiple CN entries in certificate matching

expiry.name: expiry
expiry.help: CRL verification option when CRL is expired (default = ignore).

options.name: ignore
options.help: Certificate status will be verified even if CRL is expired.
options.label: Ignore

options.name: revoke
options.help: Certificate will be revoked if CRL is expired.
options.label: Revoke

leaf-crl-absence.name: leaf-crl-absence
leaf-crl-absence.help: CRL verification option when leaf CRL is absent (default = ignore).

options.name: ignore
options.help: CRL verification against leaf certificate is ignored if CRL is absent.
options.label: Ignore

options.name: revoke
options.help: Certificate will be revoked if CRL of leaf certificate is absent.
options.label: Revoke

chain-crl-absence.name: chain-crl-absence
chain-crl-absence.help: CRL verification option when CRL of any certificate in chain is absent (default = ignore).

options.name: ignore
options.help: CRL verification is ignored if CRL of any certificate in chain is absent.
options.label: Ignore

options.name: revoke
options.help: Certificate will be revoked if CRL of any certificate in chain is absent.
options.label: Revoke

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable strict mode OCSP checking.
options.label: Enable
options.description: Enable strict mode OCSP checking

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable strict mode OCSP checking.
options.label: Disable
options.description: Disable strict mode OCSP checking

ssl-min-proto-version.name: ssl-min-proto-version
ssl-min-proto-version.help: Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).

options.name: default
options.help: Follow system global setting.
options.label: Default
options.description: Follow system global setting

options.name: SSLv3
options.help: SSLv3.
options.label: Sslv3
options.description: SSLv3

options.name: TLSv1
options.help: TLSv1.
options.label: Tlsv1
options.description: TLSv1

options.name: TLSv1-1
options.help: TLSv1.1.
options.label: Tlsv1 1
options.description: TLSv1

options.name: TLSv1-2
options.help: TLSv1.2.
options.label: Tlsv1 2
options.description: TLSv1

options.name: TLSv1-3
options.help: TLSv1.3.
options.label: Tlsv1 3
options.description: TLSv1

cmp-save-extra-certs.name: cmp-save-extra-certs
cmp-save-extra-certs.help: Enable/disable saving extra certificates in CMP mode (default = disable).

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable saving extra certificates in CMP mode.
options.label: Enable
options.description: Enable saving extra certificates in CMP mode

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable saving extra certificates in CMP mode.
options.label: Disable
options.description: Disable saving extra certificates in CMP mode

cmp-key-usage-checking.name: cmp-key-usage-checking
cmp-key-usage-checking.help: Enable/disable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode (default = enable).

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode.
options.label: Enable
options.description: Enable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode.
options.label: Disable
options.description: Disable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode

cert-expire-warning.name: cert-expire-warning
cert-expire-warning.help: Number of days before a certificate expires to send a warning. Set to 0 to disable sending of the warning (0 - 100, default = 14).

certname-rsa1024.help: 1024 bit RSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
